channel.title: Need someone more advanced then others
channel.description:
Ok, well i've had this problem with my server since V1 and tbh I've been avoiding it ever since. I'll show some small images to show you what the problem is..
Enjoy :p
Note: Before you post I did C+P the newer headicons overtop the old ones I had (still doesn't work!).
Anyway onto the pictures..

item.title: Need someone more advanced then others
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

Alright, this is fairly simple, you are loading your prayer headicons, from the wrong area of the cache, you should load from headicons prayer, but you are loading from headicons pk.

Read full topic
item.source: Need someone more advanced then others

No idea, Is the server online on an opend port? If so can i have the ip to check it out?

item.title: Need someone more advanced then others
item.dc:creator: @Skype1 Skype™
item.description:
@Skype1 wrote:

For some reason EVERY head icon (1-60) is either nothing, a red skull, or a white skull. Anything to do with where the headicons load from? and is it fixable?

Read full topic

item.source: Need someone more advanced then others

item.title: Need someone more advanced then others
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Ermm heres a command to help u figure out which is which, than I guess just change the voids

if (command.startsWith("icon")) { headIcon = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5)); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Hope that works…

Read full topic
item.source: Need someone more advanced then others

item.title: Need someone more advanced then others
item.dc:creator: @Skype1 Skype™
item.description:
@Skype1 wrote:

Didn’t fix it and it’s not the client look at the other server they work fine using the same client. I’ve copied over them voids hundreds of times it has to be a different void.

Read full topic
item.source: Need someone more advanced then others

item.title: Need someone more advanced then others
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Oh yea, easy fix. Here ya go replace thease 3 voids in client.java

public void checkHead(){ if(!isSkulled){ headIcon = 0; } if(isSkulled){ headIcon = 64; } } public void getHead(){ if(ProtMage && !isSkulled) headIcon = 4; if(ProtRange && !isSkulled) headIcon = 2; if(ProtMelee && !isSkulled) headIcon = 1; if(Retribution && !isSkulled) headIcon = 8; if(Redemption && !isSkulled) headIcon = 32; if(Smite && !isSkulled) headIcon = 16; if(ProtMage && isSkulled) headIcon = 68; if(ProtRange && isSkulled) headIcon = 66; if(ProtMelee && isSkulled) headIcon = 65; if(Retribution && isSkulled) headIcon = 72; if(Redemption && isSkulled) headIcon = 96; if(Smite && isSkulled) headIcon = 80; else if(!ProtMage && !ProtRange && !ProtMelee && !Retribution && !Redemption && !Smite) headIcon = 64; } public void turnOffHead(){ if(ProtMage) headIcon = 4; if(ProtRange) headIcon = 2; if(ProtMelee) headIcon = 1; if(Retribution) headIcon = 8; if(Redemption) headIcon = 32; if(Smite) headIcon = 16; else if(!isSkulled && !ProtMage && !ProtRange && !ProtMelee && !Retribution && !Redemption && !Smite) headIcon = 0; }[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 17, 2009, 07:37:17 pm[/size][hr]If that doesnt fix it, than theres somthing up with your clients headIcons. So… yea.

Read full topic
item.source: Need someone more advanced then others
